e4: Changes should be implemented to ensure consistent and accurate financial reporting
e5: An ethical reporting policy prioritizes transparency over short-term performance consequences or individual team comfort and emphasizes investor protection by using consistent and equitable disclosures to the market
e6: I would ask if the current bias in reporting earnings is being implemented at the recommendation of management, approved by the board over many years, how much compensation for performance is based on earnings reports. I request an analysis on the impact to retail investors in this environment and seek input from an independent financial analyst as additional perspectives are crucial to protect credibility, enforce transparency and maintain strong market confidence
